header_text: During a game night with friends, you begin playing a fast-paced card game. You are soon falling behind and don't want to ruin the fun. You tell your friends you need to slow down, and they are agreeable.

elements.Text: When you ask to slow down the game, your friends...

elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
